website_summaries.verdict: This pint-sized powerhouse is perfect for making cards, labels and many other projects. Vinyl is only one of the 50 materials it can handle.
pros: Highly portable machine that cuts up to 4 feet continuously and 20 feet repeatedly
Also can handle cardstock, iron-on material, and more
Materials have a maximum width of 5.5"

website_summaries.verdict: The perfect budget machine if you like to scrapbook, make cards, or emboss.
pros: Works well on everything from tissue paper to thin leather
Price is hard to beat if you want a simple, no-frills machine
cons: Doesn't always cut all the way through on intricate designs or thick materials
Not the one for serious crafters

customer_reviews.title: You think it would be included
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Joy, it arrives, looking forward to making cards only to find out that the Joy at $179.00 does not even come with the card making mat. Disappointing! That is a lot of money not to include some of the basic essentials to make what they show you on their demos.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Saul

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a total joke. It doesn’t hardly do anything at all. I wouldn’t pay $25 for it; much less $180. Returned it. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Money

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cutting out stickers.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to cut out stickers for my Etsy page, but no matter how much I edited my cuts to perfectly align with my stickers, the cricut would cut out in the exact same spot. Even when I tried to print from the app and cut from the print the cricut would move the cuts so they didn’t align. I wasted $20 worth of my product trying to get this cricut to work for me. Had to exchange it for the cricut air, hopefully that one will be easier to use for stickers. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Anna G

customer_reviews.title: Great new product
customer_reviews.text: Love this cricut for portability! It is easy to transport and love that the vinyl does not need mats! Very easy to set up and use. Just beware that it is only usable with Bluetooth- no USB cord
customer_reviews.author: Amy Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool little machine
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a Cricut for years but never had the money till recently. I ordered the Joy mainly cause it's cheaper and I just don't have the space for the larger models, and I'm so glad I did cause it is absolutely PERFECT for my needs. I mainly wanted it to make custom decals for my car & whatnot and the Joy is just right for that. I've made 4 or 5 already and they all turned out great. Super easy to use too, I was up & cutting within 10 minutes of opening the box.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lattanzio

customer_reviews.title: Joy
customer_reviews.text: I love my little Joy!!!! It has been very busy since I have unboxed it!!!
customer_reviews.author: n.h

customer_reviews.title: Tiny portable and well made quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd cricut. I also have the maker and air 2. I love the joy because it's so light and small ans portable and at the same time prints just as well as the bigger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Spaceship

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the Joy for over a month and I love it! I always wanted a Cricut but didn’t want the other models that were too big and I didn’t need all the functions. This one is perfect for when you just want to do vinyl decals, labels and iron ons. The only reason why I'm giving it four stars is because my blade had to be replaced within a month, I did do at least 30 + decals/labels and some were very intricate. I don’t know how many projects a blade is supposed to be able to do but I hope I don’t have to replace it monthly.
customer_reviews.author: PERKINS FAMILY

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Connect to Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: In less than a week, it stopped connecting to Bluetooth which is literally the only way you can use this model. Super disappointed and returned it because I can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Revised Review
customer_reviews.text: After initially writing a rather scathing review, I finally figured out how to get it to connect with the app, but after completing a couple of small projects, I discovered it wasn't the machine for me. It's okay, I guess, but the fact that you have to purchase materials dedicated to that machine made it a poor choice for me. There are just too many limitations for my taste, so I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Great packing great item!!!
customer_reviews.text: Greta packaging fast shipping absolutely have zero complaints. I love my cricut joy it’s portable small and convenient to take when traveling. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous, easy, affordable. Everyone needs one.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I have a fancier one, it is complicated where this one is super easy. I’ve convinced a friend to get one too. It has been fun making cards, vinyl items, and I see potential canvases everywhere I look. Very addicting.
customer_reviews.author: smalltownamerica

customer_reviews.title: This machine was given the right name Cricut “JOY”
customer_reviews.text: I was planning on doing some traveling and wanted to take my cricket machine with me. This little cricket joy is the perfect size especially when you get a case to put it in. I have made labels, iron on’s, and many other projects with this little machine during my travels. I never have to worry about not having a greeting card for any special events because I always have my little “joy“machine with me.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cadena

customer_reviews.title: Nice little machine
customer_reviews.text: You can do a lot of things and it cuts perfectly. I recommend you use only cricut materials, as I've tried with writable paper, other brands of vinyl, and they dont cut/work as great as it does with Cricut materials. You do have to do some research to understand all it does and what all the materials are for and what tools you will need for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chinex

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it can do a lot of what her sister models can do at pretty much half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Simpkins

customer_reviews.title: Love my Cricut Joy Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love the New Cricut Joy Machine for my Paper Flowers Crafts and More
customer_reviews.author: Damarys Jorge Cobian

customer_reviews.title: Compact cutter
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small cricut since I would only use it for cutting vinyl. Great packaging. My only challenge would be the time it takes to connect to my device before cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula M.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your crafting tool repotoire
customer_reviews.text: There are not enough superlatives to describe this product. My wife has a couple of cricut makes and a cameo and this could be her favorite machine. Versatile and highly portable. Easy to use and fun. If you are a crafter what are you waiting for
customer_reviews.author: John Bannon

customer_reviews.title: Can’t buy more supplies for cricut.
customer_reviews.text: I just got my joy shipped to Hong Kong a few days ago, it’s a very convenient size to use especially with the smart vinyl. The problem is I wanted to order more products and now all the cricut items are no longer shipping to Hong Kong. Is this just temporary?
customer_reviews.author: Rita Lee

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: This is the most irritating, aggravating machine ever purchased. First, I didn’t realize I would have to pay a monthly fee to have access to fonts and images. Then I received one little piece of vinyl to try to learn on so had to buy more. I have watched every video known and now have a project that the machine won’t get rid of and no matter how many times I try to add a new project it reverts to the first and wants to cut it again. Buy again, nope. Now I’m stuck with the machine, extra vinyl and paper, a card mat and too many pens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: love this for smaller projects, I have an after school program, with a board stenciling class, this will work perfect for creating the stencils for the projects. The kids will be able to print out their own. This will save me hours of prep Love the Joy
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Cricut Joy Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love the size but my thing is I noticed it was heavy on the back side so when I go to put in the case I bought I have to make sure that I have my legs ready so I don't drop it I love this Machine so much the only thing that I was kind a mad about was the iron on glitter vinyl that I bought wouldn't work it's ok I was able to use my Cricut thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love with my Cricut Joy
customer_reviews.text: You go wrong with this machine. It’s great if you want to start a small side hussle. You can use it to make T-shirts, cards, stickers, decals, cups, etc. Its a great product. It fits description. It comes with sample materials to practice with. It also includes a pen. It’s also a great size for transport.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Im fairly impressed
customer_reviews.text: My wife has gotten into Scrapbooking lately & my daughter has the larger Cricut so my wife just had to have one .... This is the one she picked & so I got it ... Now I must say this thing is TINY but I works great for small projects
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Cricut Joy. I’ve made some amazing things with it. I still have a lot more to learn, but it’s an amazing machine!
customer_reviews.author: Jayjo

customer_reviews.title: Very disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Design space stopped working so unable to use my machine the cricut joy. Not happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: dalton cox

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine for my wife's birthday and she totally loves it. She admires it every day. If it makes her that happy, I would recommend to everyone and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Keron D. Brown-Ellington

customer_reviews.title: Not as listed
customer_reviews.text: This product was such a disappointment. We had a party set up and were planning on using it but it came missing all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package already opened, not new. Missing trial vinyl.
customer_reviews.text: Product was already opened and not in new condition...It seems to work fine. But it makes me a little leary since it has been used. I’m bummed, I thought I was getting a new product.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L. Ropes

customer_reviews.title: Good Cricut.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but I think fonts and access are to expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great first cricut
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cricut and I love it. It's very easy to use. It's making me want the larger cricut so I can cut larger images as there is a size restriction that this machine can cut. I love how compact it is though as compared to the cricut maker or explore air 2
customer_reviews.author: Jenn A

customer_reviews.title: So small for $150
customer_reviews.text: I got the machine to cut transfer paper for shirts and the regular paper Doesn’t even fit for this to be $150 it’s ridiculously small I would NOT recommend for anything but small projects.
customer_reviews.author: Aalajah Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about getting the Cricut joy. I tried setting up everything which was horrible. There is a solid red light on the machine and when I read the troubleshooting FAQ's it tells me that it can be an issue with the outlet. I have tried every outlet in my house and it still is not working. I am currently on the phone now and I have been waiting for over 2 hours for help. I am just returning it and I would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: lataundria

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my wife she loves it says it’s easy to take with her to school for craft projects
customer_reviews.author: SNIPER

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy on a new crafty machine. Item arrived as described in a sealed box. No damage to the box or contents inside on arrival. Everything works great with easy to understand instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this machine when I have a small project and only need something small done I can turn this in so quick without have to set up my maker
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few uses and Cricut refuses to help
customer_reviews.text: Great product, while it worked. Terrible customer service. Really surprised by their unwillingness to support their products. Buyer beware. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but mighty
customer_reviews.text: I was able to design logos on my computer and cut them out within minutes of opening the box! Very easy to learn the basics and I can’t wait to learn its full potential.
customer_reviews.author: jennie league

customer_reviews.title: It is $10 cheaper to buy At Walmart
customer_reviews.text: It is $10 cheaper to buy At Walmart. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ajmal Omeed Ayubzai

customer_reviews.title: Small and compact
customer_reviews.text: I got this for mother's day from my daughter. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Get transfer paper
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. But I would recommend also buying transfer paper if you plan to make complex decals.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little craft buddy
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a beginner! Really easy to use. Nice to use for really quick project! A little pricey when you compare to the larger Cricut cutters. You are limited to what you can d, But it is a nice alternative if you can't afford a larger machine. Great to travel with also. I am loving it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Z.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this! It compliments her Cricut Maker well. Makes cards much easier.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use this because there were no instructions and retailers where I live seem to know nothing about the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Dornan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing technology
customer_reviews.text: The integration this device has with your smart phone is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Barberena

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the joy! Easy to use with the computer or phone app
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted and more
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing Works amazing Was missing the card matt how ever that’s why I gave it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Royer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love my cricut joy! So compact and I feel more precise than my Maker. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shee R.

customer_reviews.title: (PLG) Powerful Little Guy
customer_reviews.text: It really is your DIY best friend. It’s super tiny and easy to store when not in use, and your DIYs come out looking and feeling soooo professional!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Phomsouvanh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: It is not easy to use the software but it works perfectly:) I am still learning!
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this machine. I been so obsessed with my crafts during this time and this machine has been amazing to me. Definitely will recommend
customer_reviews.author: Damia

customer_reviews.title: USED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this under the impression that it was never used and got my cricut and the sample vinyl had already been used and I’m just not happy
customer_reviews.author: Hayley batchelor

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little machine. So many options and things you can do!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: Used. Came with a European power cord! No indication on details of this. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great mothers day gift for my mom who loves to craft she uses it all the time now!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Parts should have come with it
customer_reviews.text: The pen that comes with Joy Cricut was missing& may was not protected so sticky part is not very sticky
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Missing stuff late shipment
customer_reviews.text: There was no pen or free cricut access in my box. Also shipped in just Joy box unconverted.
customer_reviews.author: Yae

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: It’s honestly awesome I just wish it was a bit bigger
customer_reviews.author: Aalayah Jones

customer_reviews.title: It's bluetooth and no buttons
customer_reviews.text: I love it for all of my different hobbies and projects
customer_reviews.author: Shronda pickett

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: New to the cricut family but I’ve used other vinyl cutting machines before. Love that I can design and cut using the app on my phone! Super easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: CheerioChaser

customer_reviews.title: Live it
customer_reviews.text: Today I did my first proyecto I am so happy
customer_reviews.author: farides

customer_reviews.title: The Cricut Joy gave me joy
customer_reviews.text: I have a Maker and I've had an Explore Air 2 - now I have a Joy! I can make a card in less than 30 minutes from machine to mailbox. I made a sign and it cut all the viny on my 14" round door decoration. I love my Maker and use it all the time, and now I use my Joy, too. Sometimes I use them simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: DeenaS

customer_reviews.title: Small yet mighty when in a hurry!
customer_reviews.text: Cute machine! I love it does the small projects I want so I don’t have to haul out my big one!
customer_reviews.author: 37Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cricut Joy!
customer_reviews.text: I have many Cricut and Silhouette machines. They are all great but this little one is so nice because if you just want to do a quick project it is easy and fast! I would highly recommend this to even those that have a lot of Cricut experience!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B

customer_reviews.title: Cricut Access unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: My Cricut Joy worked great the first few times I used it. Then, a little over a month after purchase, the Design Space software is not working (and many others are reporting the same issue). I try cutting a card, and the 'Make It' button is unresponsive. Unintalled and reinstalled app, checked all connections, you name it. Update 7/14/2020: I am able to create cards using designs I upload, but Cricut Access designs are unresponsive. I have canceled my subscription and will continue uploading my own designs.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Way better then the bigger units
customer_reviews.text: I kind of love this little guy. I've always wanted a cricut but could never justify the price of space for a giant machine. I knew I'd end up avoiding pulling out a big machine and would instead just forgo the project. This guy though is everything I need, I can print vinyl for cups, or make custom labels or even make some greeting cards. Its small,easy to use, and I dont have to struggle with cutting and using the mat.
customer_reviews.author: selina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 3 star for easy to learn because there are absolutely no instructions. You have to YouTube or google everything. From which side of the paper goes up to why are things switching positions
customer_reviews.author: JackieO

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine, however I dont think I would suggest this to someone who is just starting out using cricut machines as there aren't a lot of instructions too it. Of you're just starting out of suggest going with the explorer air 2 and playing around with design space for a when before going with the joy
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great starter!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter for creatives. The Bluetooth function is awesome. The only minor dislike I have is the fact that the cord that you plug into the rectangle that is attached to the cord that comes nectar with the machine isn’t strong enough to stay in. It can easily be taken out with a small bump of a chair.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: 20 minutes it took me to download the software, create an account, update the firmware and cut something out. Easiest cutter I’ve ever worked with! I own other cutting systems but this is perfect for those quick jobs and cards! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy In Roseville

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I have a maker and got this to take with me to the camper on weekends! Works perfectly. Would not recommend as your only cutting machine as its limited in what it can do. For the price point, invest in a more versatile machine.
customer_reviews.author: Nisal

customer_reviews.title: Nice and convient...and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. Super easy to use with even your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Stack

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but the vinyl made for this machine is horrible! I have yet to find a transfer tape that works with it.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Wolf

customer_reviews.title: great little item
customer_reviews.text: great small package. easy to set up and use. can go anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: I love my Joy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great lil electric cutter. It lives up to the Cricut quality brand!!
customer_reviews.author: HI~crafter

product_meta.title: Cricut Joy Machine - Compact and Portable DIY Machine For Quick Vinyl, HTV Iron On and Paper Projects | Makes Custom Decals, Custom T shirt Designs, Personalized Greeting Cards, and Label Maker
product_meta.description: Style:Cricut Joy MachineTurn your inspiration board intentions into action with a little help from your DIY best friend, Cricut Joy . Ridiculously easy to set up and use, this smart little cutting and writing machine helps you make more in less time, so you'll find yourself personalizing, organizing, and customizing every single day. Cut vinyl decals for custom water bottles or wall decor. Quickly make kitchen or office labels. Bust out a birthday banner or a just-because card. It also works with Cricut Smart Materials for super-easy, super-long cuts without a cutting mat. Just load & go. With a plethora of projects that take just 15 minutes, Cricut Joy makes it fast and easy to make something unique for you – or anyone – at a moment's notice.
feature_bullets: DIY Made Easy Whether you are new to DIY, or a seasoned crafter looking for a more convenient way to complete those quick projects. This smart little cutting, writing, and label making machine is perfect for you. Cricut Joy's small size makes it the perfect companion to the Cricut Air 2 or Cricut Maker machines.

Add That Personal Touch Adding that extra touch to your projects is easier than ever. Cricut Joy can make continuous cuts up to 4 feet and repeated cuts up to 20 feet using Cricut Smart Materials. (Available in Vinyl, HTV Iron On, and Label Vinyl varieties.) No cutting mat needed. Just load and go. Or use other popular materials like Cricut Infusible Ink, Cardstock, or Insert Cards using Cricut Joy Cutting Mats and Cricut Joy Card Mats.

[Get Organized] See you later label maker. Cricut Joy can cut and write custom labels for a variety of home organization projects. Organizing the pantry, toiletries, storage bins and more with Cricut Smart Vinyl and Cricut Pens.

[Design For Free] Upload and create your own designs for free using Cricut Design Space. Design on your computer tablet or mobile device using our iOs or Android apps. Take your Design Space experience to the next level with Cricut Access, a monthly subscription to our vast library of over 100k images, fonts, and Make-It-Now projects.

[Included in the box] Cricut Joy Cutting Machine, Premium Fine Point Blade and Housing, Fine Point Pen, StandardGrip Mat (4. 5" x 6. 5"), Welcome Card, Power Adapter, Free trial membership to Cricut Access (for new subscribers, 50 ready-to-make projects online, and sample Smart Material for a practice cut.)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars879 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
